item.title: The IRA benefit to the American Economy
item.description: The Inflation Reduction Act’s investments are bearing fruit by creating good-paying jobs, strengthening our energy security, tackling climate change, and improving services the IRS provides to taxpayers. As a part of President Biden’s broader Investing in America agenda, Treasury will continue to collect and share data, analysis, and stories about how the IRA is aiding American families and workers, driving investment toward underserved communities as well as to new technologies and markets, and ensuring economic fairness.
